description: The Mountain Top Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry brings you the latest snow fall, snow surface conditions,  base depth, trail, and lift operations information.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask Mountain Top for the snow report
Alexa, ask Mountain Top for latest conditions

name: Snow Report for Mountain Top
shortDescription: The Mountain Top Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry provides the latest ski and snowboarding conditions for MountainTop.
